mapper.sql: id, apply_detail_id, material_type_id, location_wbs, location_name, pallet_id, amount, ebs_wh_code, ebs_wh_child_code, trade_no, price
mapper.select: SELECT t.*, t8.code as locationCode, t5.category1, t3.train_no, t3.order_code, t5.code as materialCode, t5.name as materialName, t5.spec as materialSpec, NVL(t1.unit_price, 0) as materialUnitPrice, t1.confirm_time, t3.line_id, t7.depot_id, t4.id AS workshopId, t4.name as workshopName, t6.id AS trainid, t7.repair_program_id AS programId, t3.fd_project, t3.fd_task, t3.fd_cost_type FROM bu_material_assign_detail t left join bu_material_apply_detail t1 on t1.id = t.apply_detail_id left join bu_material_apply t2 on t2.id = t1.apply_id LEFT JOIN bu_work_order t3 ON t3.id = t2.work_order_id LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_workshop t4 ON t4.id = t3.workshop_id LEFT JOIN bu_material_type t5 ON t5.id = t.material_type_id LEFT JOIN bu_train_info t6 on t6.train_no = t3.train_no LEFT JOIN bu_repair_plan t7 on t7.id = t3.plan_id LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_warehouse t8 on t8.wbs = t.location_wbs where t.apply_detail_id = #{applyDetailId}

SELECT t.*, t8.code as locationCode, t5.category1, t3.train_no, t3.order_code, t5.code as materialCode, t5.name as materialName, t5.spec as materialSpec, NVL(t5.price, 0) as materialUnitPrice, t1.confirm_time, t3.line_id, t7.depot_id, t4.id AS workshopId, t4.name as workshopName, t6.id AS trainid, t7.repair_program_id AS programId, t3.fd_project, t3.fd_task, t3.fd_cost_type FROM bu_material_assign_detail t left join bu_material_apply_detail t1 on t1.id = t.apply_detail_id left join bu_material_apply t2 on t2.id = t1.apply_id LEFT JOIN bu_work_order t3 ON t3.id = t2.work_order_id LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_workshop t4 ON t4.id = t3.workshop_id LEFT JOIN bu_material_type t5 ON t5.id = t.material_type_id LEFT JOIN bu_train_info t6 on t6.train_no = t3.train_no LEFT JOIN bu_repair_plan t7 on t7.id = t3.plan_id LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_warehouse t8 on t8.wbs = t.location_wbs where t1.status != 0 AND t.amount > 0 AND t1.confirm_time >= #{date} ORDER BY t1.confirm_time DESC

select t.*, t1.apply_id, t2.trans_id, t2.trans_time, t2.success_status, t2.success_time, t2.message from bu_material_assign_detail t left join bu_material_apply_detail t1 on t1.id = t.apply_detail_id left join bu_maximo_trans_data t2 on t2.obj_id = t.id where t1.apply_id
in
#{applyId}
= '-1'
